com.twitter.heron.api.bolt

Interface IRichBolt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBolt, IComponent, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatorBolt, BaseBatchBolt, BaseRichBolt, BasicBoltExecutor, CountAggregatorBolt, IncrementBolt, IntegrationTestBolt, IRichBoltDelegate, IRichBoltDelegate, LocalAggregatorBolt, MapAggregatorBolt, PartialUniquerBolt, TestBolt, WordCountBolt

    public interface IRichBolt
extends IBolt, IComponent
    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.
